name: DF-New Level Upload API

account_contract.username_source: Firebase ID token via accounts:lookup (fallback: accountUsername, then author)
account_contract.auth: Firebase auth token via ?auth=<token> for Realtime Database writes/reads

notes: This is a static web client, not a server runtime.
Database auth depends on your Firebase rules; pass token via UI if required.
Uploaded level IDs are generated as username-levelname.
